description: The head of the Onishi Office of the Organo and also serves as the Organo`s executive director / deputy chairman. Having both his legs texhnolyzed, Onishi has the unique ability to hear the "voice of the city," and gain information that no ordinary person can access. His cool and collected personality and his competence have quickly accelerated his rise to the top within the Organo. He also seems to be a man of duty and respect. Despite his busy schedule, Onishi makes it a point to regularly visit Gotoh, the head of Organo, in the hospital.
name: Oonishi Keigo
